title: Zootopia 2 (2025) | Animation, Action, Adventure
description: Zootopia 2: Directed by Jared Bush, Byron Howard. With Jason Bateman, Yvette Nicole Brown, Quinta Brunson, Tommy Chong. Brave rabbit cop Judy Hopps and her friend, the fox Nick Wilde, team up again to crack a new case, the most perilous and intricate of their careers.
